segments.text: Just give the man standing there three yuan and he'll give you a token . Then you slip it into slot at the turnstile and push the turnstile to get in .

segments.text: Where can I get the subway Madam ?

segments.text: Ask the worker who sells token to give you one . It ’ s free of charge . Actually maps showing subway routes are posted at most stations .
